code: import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import useWindowDimensions from"react-native-web/dist/exports/useWindowDimensions";export default function useStyles(disabled){var buttonWidth=width*0.1;var _useWindowDimensions=useWindowDimensions(),width=_useWindowDimensions.width,height=_useWindowDimensions.height;var buttonColor=disabled?'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35)':'rgba(0, 118, 185, 0.35)';return StyleSheet.create({button:{backgroundColor:buttonColor,borderRadius:14,minWidth:buttonWidth,paddingVertical:10,paddingHorizontal:20,alignSelf:'right',marginVertical:10,marginRight:20,flex:1},buttonText:{fontFamily:'Montserrat-Regular',color:'#000000',fontSize:Math.min(width*0.015,height*0.06),textAlign:'center'}});}
